original_text: With him we are sending the brother who is famous among all the churches for his preaching of the gospel.
korean_text: 또 그와 함께 그 형제를 보내었으니 이 사람은 복음으로써 모든 교회에서 칭찬을 받는 자요

sentences.original_text: With him we are sending the brother
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그와 함께 그 형제를 보냅니다.

sentences.original_text: who is famous among all the churches
for his preaching of the gospel.
